name: In Vivo Learning
description:
Just a platformer game.

You will learn new movements while progressing through levels.

At start you should be able only to move (WASD), jump (SPACE) and cruouch(S/Down), suicide(LCTRL)

Dashing ground and air (double tap D/A or press E/Q/Left/Right)

Double Jump (Space while in air)

Hover Jets (Hold space   |   W/S/Up/Down while in no gravity zone)

Wall jump (press space)

Wall charged jump (hold space)

Ledge Holding (just move to the direction of ledge, S to drop down)

If you are realy stuck at some level and care enough you can post the question in comments. If I will care enough I should tell you how to finish it.

Playtime ~1-3 h
